[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Who We Are” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:center|color:%23404244″ google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]Ali Hassan & Associates was founded in 2003 with a strong vision of providing exceptional legal representation in the UAE. With over 18 years of experience the firm has proven success and understanding of the legal system and its framework. This success is founded on the philosophy of offering support and professional advice to clients whilst still dealing with each case in a culturally sensitive manner.

Ali Hassan & Associates pride themselves on being extensively knowledgeable and specialists in several areas of practice within the Middle East. These areas include Property & Real Estate, Maritime & Aviation, Dispute Resolution, Banking & Finance, Corporate & Commercial, Construction & Infrastructure, Employment, Compensation, Criminal, Cyber Law, Insurance, Intellectual Property, Iraqi law, Litigation & Arbitration and Shariah law.

The team at Ali Hassan & Associates provides solutions with an unparalleled personal service to ensure from a legal perspective your business or case is successful. Since inception the firm has had great privilege in representing several high profile clients, which include Al-Yousef Motors, Bank Melli Iran, Emirates NBD and Wade Adams Contracting Company reflecting the integrity and high proficiency of the work accomplished at Ali Hassan & Associates. Client comfort and satisfaction is a key factor of the operations at the firm as it permits freedom to conduct a higher calibre of work and litigate directly on behalf of the client providing accurate, beneficial and cost effective advice.

Regardless of the area of law, Ali Hassan’s lawyers are dedicated to achieving the best possible outcome for our clients with sophisticated yet practical legal advice to avoid unnecessary complications and stress for the client. With ongoing and frequent expansion plans, the firm has always been able to cater to the growing demand while maintaining integrity and professionalism.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1899″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”1900″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”visible-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Mission” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:center|color:%23404244″ google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]Our mission at Ali Hassan & Associates is to provide unparalleled, high quality and culturally sensitive legal services while keeping pace and anticipating the needs of existing and potential businesses and individual clients we serve in the U.A.E. We are dedicated to offering legal services in a timely manner that adheres to the highest standards of integrity and excellence, at fees that are competitive and reasonable for both the clients and the firm.

Our vision is to establish ourselves as one of the leading and trusted customer focused law firms in the U.A.E by 2025.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Certificates” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32|text_align:center|color:%23404244″ google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1528881872344{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1816″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”http://www.legal500.com/firms/18474-al-kabban-associates/25100-dubai-united-arab-emirates” el_id=”certificates_img”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]The Legal 500 is an accredited and renowned Global Directory for Law Firms, operating for 29 years. The Legal 500 has been undertaking rigorous research to analyze the capabilities of different law firms across the globe and to assess the strengths of law firms in over 100 jurisdictions.

The Legal 500 has praised Ali Hassan & Associates for its diverse skills and knowledge base, and for its continuous provision of cutting-edge and innovative advice to counselling.

As a result, The Legal 500 has recognized and acknowledged Ali Hassan & Associates as amongst the best litigation advocates and legal consultants in the region.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1512636405283{padding-bottom: 120px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Practice Areas” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32|text_align:center|color:%23404244″ google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1515579649747{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_accordion][vc_accordion_tab title=”Arbitration”][vc_column_text]Ali Hassan & Associates are an authorized and experienced firm in conducting Arbitrations in Dubai.
